div1.p: United States District Court for the Western District of Washington
In the Matter of the application of Celia Berg O'Neill alias. Celia Berg for a Writ of Habeas Corpus
To the Clerk of the above Entitled Court:

You will please enter my appearance as attorney for Celia Berg O'Neill in the above entitled cause, and service of all subsequent papers, except writs and process, may be made upon said petitioner, by leaving the same with
NOTICE-Attorneys will please endorse their own Filings. Rule 11.
